question:
The Bio-Bridge Initiative:
  1. is an agreement between European Union and the Secretariat of the CBD (Convention on Biological Diversity)
  2. aims at facilitating the developing countries with funds to promote technical and scientific cooperation on biodiversity
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u> because the Bio-Bridge Initiative is an agreement between Republic of Korea and the Secretariat of the CBD (Convention on Biological Diversity.
